UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of a primary antibacterial domain in CAP18, a lipopolysaccharide binding protein from rabbit leukocytes
Literature.Author: Tossi A, Scocchi M, Skerlavaj B, Gennaro R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM)
